section.title:
accounts payable
check journal
check journal
printing of
check journal
reprinting of Check Journal
section.para: When posting A/P Checks in batch mode, you are given the option to print a Check Journal. To print a Check Journal, select the "Check Journal" option. The following screen will appear:
When printing or reprinting a Check Journal, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the number of the Check Journal you want to print.Check Journals are created when A/P Checks are posted. The Journal Number you select will include both the Check Journal Number and also the date when the Checks were posted.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without printing a Check Journal, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
